member.name: M:Cake.XComponent.XcStudioAliases.SetXcStudioPath(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String)
member.summary: This method sets the path of XcStudio that will be used by all other commands.

member.name: M:Cake.XComponent.XcStudioAliases.XcStudioCreateLauncher(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method creates a .bat file to easily launch a XComponent project using the version of XComponent Studio found in the tools folder.
member.param: The path of the project to launch with XComponent Studio
The output path to write the launcher

member.name: M:Cake.XComponent.XcBuildAliases.SetXcBuildPath(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String)
member.summary: This method sets the path of XcBuild that will be used by all other commands.

member.summary: This method builds the XComponent project.
member.param: Additional arguments to pass to XComponent Build

member.summary: This method exports runtimes for an XComponent project.

Additional arguments to pass to XComponent Build
